The 06/02/2018 Jihad Watch Daily Digest:
Please use this link to forward to a friend (we really appreciate it), do not use your email client to forward, as they may inadvertently unsubscribe you.

“O you who believe! The non-Muslims are nothing but dirt.”
By Robert Spencer on Jun 01, 2018 03:51 pm

Ramadan Day 15 thought for the day from my new book The History of Jihad: In his famous outreach speech to the Islamic world from Cairo on June 4, 2009, Barack Obama said: Islam has a proud tradition of tolerance. We see it in the history of Andalusia and Cordoba during the Inquisition…. Tolerant al-Andalus: […]
Read in browser »

   

Ramadan in the Netherlands: Muslims break windows of Hindu temple for second time in a week
By Robert Spencer on Jun 01, 2018 03:31 pm

An overflow of Ramadan piety in The Hague. This happened last week as well. “Mayor intervenes after new vandalism at Hindu temple in The Hague,” translated from “Burgemeester grijpt in na nieuwe vernielingen bij hindoetempel Den Haag,” NOS, May 30, 2018 (thanks to Sounav): The windows of the Hindu temple in the Schilderswijk area of […]
Read in browser »

   

Germany: Court rules that Muslim migrant may become German citizen despite having two wives
By Robert Spencer on Jun 01, 2018 01:44 pm

The principle is always and everywhere the same: whenever Islamic law and mores and Western law and mores are in conflict, Western principles must give way. The Western political and media elites have already internalized this principle, and are acting upon it, as in this case. And as far as they’re concerned, the sooner the […]
Read in browser »

   

Ramadan in Syria: Muslims murder at least seven civilians with bombs in market area and residential area
By Robert Spencer on Jun 01, 2018 11:49 am

“Located in northern Syria near the Turkish border, Idlib was declared a ‘de-escalation zone’ last May, in which acts of aggression are forbidden.” Obviously that was just an empty public relations move. “Two blasts kill at least seven civilians in Syria,” TRT World, May 31, 2018 (thanks to The Religion of Peace): At least seven […]
Read in browser »

   

Robert Spencer video: “Moderate” Muslim scholar Akbar Ahmed wants a “New Andalusia”
By Robert Spencer on Jun 01, 2018 11:27 am

In this new video, I discuss Islamic scholar Akbar Ahmed’s call for a “New Andalusia,” and what a “New Andalusia” would mean for non-Muslims in Spain and all across Europe as a whole. Preorder The History of Jihad From Muhammad to ISIS here.
Read in browser »

   

Hugh Fitzgerald: Tariq Ramadan Accuser Henda Ayari Corrects Herself
By Hugh Fitzgerald on Jun 01, 2018 11:15 am

Henda Ayari, the first woman to have accused Tariq Ramadan of sexual assault, has changed her account of the events that led up to the incident, the French daily Liberation first reported on Wednesday, May 30. Here is the story from Al Jazeera: “Tariq Ramadan’s accuser changes details of rape account,” Al Jazeera, May 30, […]
Read in browser »

   

Islamicize Me Day 16: It’s Dawah Time!
By David Wood on Jun 01, 2018 10:59 am

On Day 16, the gang decides to spread the true message of Islam by taking Muhammad’s teachings to the streets! Canada: Muslim robs jewelry store to pay for other Muslims to travel to Syria and join the Islamic State
By Christine Douglass-Williams on Jun 01, 2018 10:54 am

An Alberta judge has granted an extradition order for a man facing terrorism charges in the United States after he allegedly helped pay for his relatives to travel to Syria.  Abdullahi Ahmed Abdullahi, 33, is accused of being part of a January 2014 jewelry store robbery in Edmonton to fund the Syrian trips…..Abdullahi shouted in […]
Read in browser »

   

Italy: Popular anti-Muslim migration, “Euroceptic” coalition back on track after backlash to President’s sabotage attempt
By Christine Douglass-Williams on Jun 01, 2018 10:45 am

Jihad Watch reported several days ago that Italy’s President Sergio Mattarella sabotaged the popular anti-Muslim migration, “Euroceptic” coalition. Mattarella “used his largely ceremonial position as head of state to controversially block the two parties’ previous Cabinet from taking office.” That led to calls for his impeachment, while leaders of Five-Star and the League began organizing rallies […]
Read in browser »

   

African migrants report slavery, torture in 99% Muslim Algeria
By Christine Douglass-Williams on Jun 01, 2018 10:42 am

Muslim Arabs holding black slaves continues to this day in countries such as Mauritania and Sudan. Now: Dozens of Africans say they were sold for labour and trapped in slavery in Algeria in what aid agencies fear may be a widening trend of abusing migrants headed for a new life in Europe. Algeria is 99% […]
Read in browser »

   

Ireland invites Palestinian jihadi plane hijacker to speak at teachers’ club in Dublin
By Christine Douglass-Williams on Jun 01, 2018 10:37 am

Israel has lodged an official protest to Ireland over the invitation of Leila Khaled, a convicted Palestinian plane hijacker who has continued to advocate violence against Israelis, to speak at a teachers’ club in Dublin belonging to the Irish National Teachers’ Organization. Violent jihadist “plane hijacker Leila Khaled” is invited to speak at a teachers’ […]
Read in browser »

source.name: Called By Christ To Be ONE

feed.name: Called By Christ To Be ONE
feed.description: Christ Jesus prayed that all those who would believe in Him would be ONE, just as He and the Father are ONE; that they be brought to complete unity so that the world would know that He was sent by the Father. (John 17:20-23)
